Review: ‘Buena Vista Social Club’ Musical Sounds Great, but Lacks a Story

MAKING HISTORY

“Buena Vista Social Club,” the new musical based on the famous Cuban band, is full of wonderful singing and orchestral dazzle, but its script and story need sharpening to match.

Tim Teeman 

Senior Editor and Writer

Published Dec. 13 2023 9:30PM EST
